name: iHealth No-Touch Digital Forehead Thermometer for Adults, Babies, Kids, 3 Ultra-Sensitive Sensors, Quiet Vibration Feedback, Large LED Digits, Easy to Use for Home, PT3 Black
short_description: Non-Contact Technology for Hygienic Use: Utilizing the built-in infrared temperature sensor, the iHealth PT3 thermometer can read a person’s body temperature within 1.18 inches from the center of the forehead without physical contact.

High Accuracy via 3 Ultra-Sensitive Sensors: An infrared sensor that captures over 100 data points per second for optimal algorithm results, complemented by the distance and environmental sensors that work together to adjust for factors such as ambient temperature and measurement distance, ensuring high accuracy in every measurement.

Simple, Fast, Clear, and Quiet: With its intuitive single-button control design, the iHealth PT3 thermometer reads and displays the temperature in just one second on its easy-to-read, extra-large LED display, even in the dark. Once a temperature reading is captured, the PT3 will give a gentle vibration notification.

Portable, Convenient, and Versatile for All Occasions: The iHealth PT3 is designed for all age groups, from babies and toddlers to the elderly. Its portable and convenient design makes it an ideal choice for at-home use, as well as in hospitals, hotels, schools, and other public or private locations.
What You Get: 1 iHealth PT3 thermometer, 2 AAA batteries, 1 Instruction manual, 1× Quick start guide, and our worry-free 12-month warranty with friendly California-based customer service.

name: Upgraded Digital Infrared Thermometer Gun -58°F~1112°F, Handheld Non Contact Heat Laser Temperature Gun, IR Thermometer Temp Gun with Adjustable Emissivity for Cooking/BBQ/Fridge/Engine(Not for Human)
short_description: 🎁【High Accuracy】 DESOMIYE laser thermometer gun adopts the latest high-sensitivity temperature sensor, which can measure the temperature range of -50°C~600°C (-58°F~1112°F) in only 0.5 seconds. For best results, the reader should be 14 inches away from the object.

🎁【Emissivity Calibration Mode】For increased accuracy, easily change the emissivity from 0.1–1.0 by holding the left and right buttons according to different materials to get the most accurate value. For normal household use, we recommend using 0.95 emissivity.

🎁【Ease of Use】 Effortlessly scan the surface of your target, press and hold the trigger on the infrared thermometer gun, and release to instantly obtain live temperature readings spanning from -50°C to 600°C (-58°F to 1112°F).

🎁【User-friendly 】 With hold data function, unit switching (°C/°F), temperature calibration range between -3°C ~ 3°C. Each IR temperature gun has a large backlit LCD screen for easy temperature reading even in the dark, and 12 seconds auto-off to prolong battery life so you won't run out of power accidentally.

🎁【Versatile Design】Infrared technology makes it to measure the surface temperature of various objects especially temperatures above boiling points and below freezing points. Use it for cooking, baking, grilling, frozen food, fried food, car repair, completing HVAC projects, plantation, winemaking, water temperature measurement, appliances, etc.

🎁【Not Suitable for Humans】 This infrared thermometer gun is an industrial thermometer, it cannot be used to measure body temperature. The reading measured by the temperature measuring gun is the surface temperature of objects and liquids, and cannot measure the internal temperature, so the temperature of people or animals measured will be inaccurate.
